description: Advertisement consent for the display of 1 no. internally illuminated portrait LED advertisement digital screen, 4m(w) x 6m(h) on the southern flank wall of 38 Stamford Hill.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-67c60acf-7fff-6250-47be-65ea81f669a4"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed illuminated advertisement, by reason of its scale, siting, design and appearance would comprise an overly prominent, incongruous and discordant feature to the detriment of the character and appearance of the site and wider surrounding public realm.&nbsp; As such, the proposal would be contrary to Policy</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">D3 (</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach) </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">and</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> D8 (Public Realm)</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> of the London Plan (2021) and policies LP1 (</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Design Quality and Local Character)</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">, LP7 (</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Advertisements) and PP1 (Public Realm) </span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">of Hackney's Local Development Plan (2020).</span></span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-41cc6f06-7fff-053e-9f16-86fa836b7ec3"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">The proposed illuminated advertisement, by reason of its scale, prominent location and level of illumination, would have an unacceptable impact upon public safety and highway visibility to the detriment of vehicular and pedestrian safety. As such, the proposal would be contrary to policies D8 (Public Realm), T1 (Strategic Approach to Transport), T2 (Healthy Streets), T4 (Assessing and Mitigating Transport Impacts) of the London Plan (2021) and policies PP1 (Public Realm), LP41 (Liveable Neighbourhoods), LP42 (Walking and Cycling), LP43 (Transport and Development) of Hackney's Local Development Plan (2020).</span></span></p>
